Summary: Fast Moving White Light / Monmouth County N.J.
divs: sighting details78 degrees f, crystal clear cloud free sky, unlimited cieling, while lying on ahammock staring up to the sky just above and to the right i observed a whitelight darting in an area that would be equivelent to a softball held at armslength. i watched it closely for about 45 seconds and saw no other air trafficfor several minutes prior. the glowing object darted to a stationary point justsouth west of where it displayed these movemnets. it seemed to start glowingand dissappeared. i have been a police officer for 23 years and have seen manyexplainable things in the nites sky. this was not one of them. the onlydescrition i can equate is when the watch crystal catches a beam of sun anddances around the walls \ cielings. sorry for the low tech description for apossible high tech event. would love to know if radar tracked thisevent.respectfully,david h. korey-new jersey
